category.name: Business Modeler

preference.name: ITEM_autogenerate_id
preference.preference_description: Determines whether an initial ID is automatically created when creating an item of the type specified in this preference in a rich client session. This preference is deprecated. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter item type.
